description: Provide access to Chinese stock market data including historical prices, real-time data, news, and financial statements. Retrieve comprehensive financial information for stocks with flexible parameters. Enhance your financial analysis and decision-making with up-to-date market insights.

capabilities.name: get_hist_data
capabilities.description: Get historical stock market data. 'eastmoney_direct' support all A,B,H shares

capabilities.name: get_realtime_data
capabilities.description: Get real-time stock market data. 'eastmoney_direct' support all A,B,H shares

capabilities.name: get_cash_flow
capabilities.description: Get company cash flow statement data.

capabilities.name: get_financial_metrics
capabilities.description: Get key financial metrics from the three major financial statements.

capabilities.name: get_time_info
capabilities.description: Get current time with ISO format, timestamp, and the last trading day.
